nodes.text: Tarubo Bunzo was a Dyplotid, male trade representative of Astantu Distillery of the Ring of Kafrene. He had brought his finest samples to convince Dryden Vos to work with him. Bunzo was present in the First Light when Han Solo met Qi'ra again.

Tarubo Bunzo first appeared in the 2018 anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide written by Pablo Hidalgo.
